You Should Know Before You Start: No Leads assigned to you Click "+" to add lead Customers can avail Doorstep Hub services by log on to the website or you can call our Customer care team. According to our company standards, we charge 250/- for Visiting and inspecting your issues related to home appliance and customers no need to pay if he/ she render our repairing services on home appliances. Customers can render free visiting and problem inspecting services on the cleaning and pest control and depend on the provided repair services some amount will be charged.
Our electrical services offer comprehensive services including Interior Design, Installation, and Maintenance of your Buildings Lighting and Alarm Systems. And we provide electrical services starting from the service charges 250/-
We provide a 30-day guarantee on all our services provided with the reference of the booking ID and the booking date of the services of the customers. During this period of 30 days, if the customer finds a problem with our services, then he can get our services again free of cost.

Doorstep Hub is recognized as the fastest startup company in Hyderabad.We help clients get trusted professionals for alltheir service needs.We have professionals for all their service needs.We have passionate,young peaople who work smart to make a difference in people\'s lives bymeeting their service needs at their doorstep.Be it getting a plumbing job done,we provide best working carpenters,getting to done, we provide best working carpenters,getting to done repair works for kitchen equipment,computers, and electronic goods,we are a sure shot destination for your service needs.We strive to be the best service providers and believe in treating our customes and business partners with honesty, courtesy and respect.
